name: Entie's Journey
description:
From light to dark. From the beautiful flowering landscape of Earth into the deep darkness of space. This is the journey of little Entie.

An alien on a journey to discover the universe. Although it is said that not everything is black and white, the endless loop of visits to planet Earth and the inhospitable space planet Ekstere, somewhere in the middle of an unknown galaxy in which he is mysteriously stranded, does not suggest it.

The Entie destroys with its own body the trappings of each newly visited place on both planets. He smashes down crystal walls and explosive crates, slaughtering local enemies to overcome all obstacles and move one step further.

However, he encounters nothing else during his wanderings, and so it seems that he has indeed gotten into an endless loop of a beautiful positive environment that turns into an inhospitable depressing space plain. But enemies are everywhere, and their numbers are growing...
